rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0002
rows.name:
And thanks...for your help
with the food contest.

rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Up to that point, I just
couldn't stop thinking about
what happened to my parents.

rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0004
rows.name:
But lately I've seen so many people
here who've stuck it out and are doing
their best in spite of everything.

rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0005
rows.name:
And I can help too, by making
delicious food for those people!

rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0006
rows.name:
I think that's what my mum
and dad would have wanted.

rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Of course, I include all of you in
those people doing their best.

rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0008
rows.name:
So when this is all over, I
hope you'll come and sample my
famous Tricolor Acqua Pazza!
